quote: I am not really breaking any rules. Charlie said I could never take another step through the door again... I came in through the window... Still, the intent was clear,"" said Edward.
quote_letters: I AM NOT REALLY BREAKING ANY RULES CHARLIE SAID I COULD NEVER TAKE ANOTHER STEP THROUGH THE DOOR AGAIN I CAME IN THROUGH THE WINDOW STILL THE INTENT WAS CLEAR SAID EDWARD
